sentences.english: In the factories the workers shouted the good news to each other.
sentences.chinese: 在工厂里，工人都把这个好消息奔走相告。

sentences.english: Fifteen folk Mid-Autumn festival atmosphere thick flavour, sell the joys of heaven and earth.
sentences.chinese: 中秋十五民俗气氛浓味漫延，奔走相告欢天地。

sentences.english: What I want is a tale of sound and fury that some idiot went and told.
sentences.chinese: 我想要的仅是白痴嘴里奔走相告的传说。
